column2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang / rab tu lhun po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / lhun po'i @3b rgyal po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo kun g-yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang / lhun po'i dbyangs dang / sprin gyi rgyal po dang / rnga dbyangs dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i tog dang; rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po che 'byung ba dang / rin po che snang ba dang / rin po che'i 'khar ba dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rin po che'i bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rin po che'i gling dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / chos bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis kun tu brgyan pa dang / dbyangs bkod pa dang / dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / nyi ma me'i 'od 'phro can dang / skar ma la dga' ba dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / gser bzang po rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i @4a *//

column1: anutpAda sAkzAt kriyA avatAraH hetu dIpanA karma Pala avipraNASaH Darma darSanam mArga BAvanA taTAgata samavaDAnam tIkzNa prajQa tA satya anupraveSaH Darma jQAnam pratisaMvid avatAra jQAnam akzara pada praBeda jQAnam vastUnAm samatikramaH Goza parijQA prAmodya pratilABaH Darma prIti anuBavana tA ArjavatA mArdavatA Rjuka tA akuwila tA vigata BRkuwitA surata tA su SIla tA sa aKilyam mADuryam smita muKa tA pUrva aBilApitA ehi iti svAgata vAdi tA anAlasyam guru gOrava tA guru SuSrUzA upapatti saMtuzwiH
column2: dang / skye mched sel ba dang / sred pa spong ba dang / mi skye ba mngon sum du byed pa la 'jug pa dang / rgyu gsal bar byed pa dang / las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gson pa dang / chos mthong ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / dngos po rnams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / sgra yongs su shes pa dang / dga' ba rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba rjes su myong ba dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / shugs drang ba dang / gya gyu med pa dang / khro gnyer dang bral ba dang / des pa dang / ngang tshul dge ba dang / byams par 'dzin pa dang / 'jam pa dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gsong por smra ba dang / legs par 'ongs so //

column1: Sukla Darma atRpta tA AjIva viSudDiH araNya vAsAn utsargaH BUmi vyavasTAna jQAnam smRteH avipraNASaH skanDa kOSalyam DAtu kOSalyam Ayatana kOSalyam aBijQA sAkzAt kriyA avatAraH kleSa apakarzaNam vAsanA anusaMGi samudDAtaH jQAna viSeza gAmitA BAvanA nizyandaH Apatti vyutTAna kOSalyam paryutTAna vizkamBaNam anuSaya prahANam vEdya  Bava samatikramaH jAti smaratA nizkAFkzatA karma vipAke Darma citta tA Sruta paryezwi jQAna tIkzNa tA jQAna tRzNA jQAna anuboDaH AjAneya BUmiH SEla upama citta tA akampyatA acala tA avinivartanIya BUmi vyavasTAna jQAnam kuSala Darma nizyandaH pApa Darma jugupsana tA asamudAcAra tA kleSAnAm SikzAyAH aparityAgaH samADi vyavasTAnam ASaya jQAnam sattvezu upapatti viSeza jQAnam samatA jQAnam vacana pratisaMDi jQAnam gRhAvAsa parityAgaH trEDAtuke naBiratiH anavalIna citta tA Darmezu anaBiniveSaH sat Darma parigrahaH Darma guptiH karma vipAka pratyayana tA vinaya kOSalyam aDikaraNa vyupaSamaH avigrahaH avivAdaH kzAnti BUmiH kzAnti samAdAnam gati samatA Darma pravicaya kOSalyam
column2: tshur shog ces smras pa dang / le lo med pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang / skye bas chog shes pa dang / chos dkar pos mi ngoms pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba dang / sa rnam par bzhag pa shes pa dang / dran pa chud mi gzon pa dang / phung po la mkhas @7b pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs pa sel ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang / khyad par du 'gro ba dang / bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / nyes pa las dbyung ba la mkhas pa dang / kun nas ldang ba gnon pa dang; bag la nyal spong ba dang / srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / skye ba dran pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la nem nur med pa dang / chos sems pa dang / thos pa 'tshol ba dang / ye shes rno ba dang / ye shes la sred pa dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa dang / cang shes kyi sa dang / sems ri lta bu dang / mi sgul ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang; phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / sdig pa'i chos la smod pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'jog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / skye ba'i khyad par shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / tshig gi mtshams sbyor ba shas pa dang / khyim na gnas pa yongs su gtong ba dang / khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / sems zhum pa med pa @8a *//

column1: pravrajyA cittam Darma viniScaya kOSalyam Darma pada praBeda jQAnam Darma pada aBinirhAra kOSalyam arTa anarTa saMBeda pada nirhAra kOSalya jQAnam pUrva anta jQAnam aparAnta jQAnam pratyutpanna jQAnam tri aDva samatA jQAnam tri maNxala pariSudDi jQAnam kAya avasTAna jQAnam citta avasTAna jQAnam IryA paTa rakzaNam IryA paTa vikopanam IryA paTa vikalpanam IryA paTa prAsAdika tA arTa anarTa kOSalya jQAnam yukta BANitA loka jQa tA mukta tyAgitA pratata pANitA anavagRhIta citta tA hrI vya patra pitA akuSala citta jugupsana tA DUta guNAn utsargaH cAritra samAdAnam priya samudAcAra tA gurUNAm pratyutTAna Asana pradAna tA mAna nigrahaH citta saMpragrahaH citta samutpAda jQAnam arTa prativeDa jQAnam jQAna prativeDa jQAnam jQAna anuboDaH ajQAna vigamaH citta praveSa jQAnam citta svaBAva anuboDa jQAnam AhAra nirhAra kOSalya jQAnam sarva ruta jQAnam nirukti vyavasTAna jQAnam arTa viniScaya jQAnam anarTa vivarjanam sat puruza samavaDAnam sat puruza saMsevana tA kApuruza vivarjanam DyAnAnAm nizpAdanam tatra ca anAsvAdanam aBijQA vikurvaNam nAma saMketa prajQapti svaBAva avatAra jQAnam prajQapti samudDAtaH saMskArezu nirvedaH satkArezu anaBilAzaH asatkArezu upekzA lABe narTika tA alABe nava lInatA yaSasi anaBilAzaH ayaSasya pratiGaH praSaMsAyAm anunayaH nindAyAmavizAdaH suKe naBizu aFgaH duHKe vEmuKyam saMskArANAm anAdAna tA BUta varNe saFgaH aBUta varNe DivAsana tA gRhasTa pravrajitEH asaMstavaH agocara vivarjanam gocara pracAraH AcAra saMpad
column2: dang; chos la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos srung ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang; 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa dang / 'gyed pa med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i sa dang / bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang; 'gro ba mnyam pa dang / chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa dang / chos kyi chig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / chos kyi tshig nges par dgod pa la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang; 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa shes pa dang / lus gnas pa shes pa dang / sems gnas pa shes pa dang / spyod lam srung ba dang / spyod lam mi 'khrugs pa dang; spyod lam mi 'chos pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa dang / don dang don ma yin pa la mkhas shing shes pa dang / rigs par smra ba dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang; lhug par gtong ba dang / lag brkyang pa dang / sems kyis 'dzin pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mi dge ba'i sems la smod pa @8b dang; sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba dang / cho ga yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dga' bar spyod pa dang / bla ma la ldang zhing stan 'ding ba dang / nga rgyal tshar gcod pa dang / sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sems skye ba shes pa dang / don rtogs par shes pa dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa dang / mi shes pa med par gyur pa dang / sems la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / sgrub pa dang nges par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / sgra skad thams cad shes pa dang / nges pa'i tshig rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang / don gtan la dbab par shes pa dang / gnod pa rnam par spong ba dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'grogs pa dang / skyes bu ngan pa rnam par spong ba dang / bsam gtan rnams sgrub cing de la ro myong bar mi byed pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul ba dang / ming dang brda dang gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa shes pa dang / btags pa yang dag par 'joms pa dang / 'du byed rnams la skyo ba dang / bkur sti mi 'dod pa dang / bkur sti med pa la btang snyoms su byed pa dang / rnyed pa la don du mi gnyer ba dang / rnyed pa med pa la zhum pa med pa dang / snyan pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi snyan pa la khong khro ba med pa dang / bstod pa la dga' ba med pa @9a *//

column1: anAcAra vivarjana tA kulAnAm adUzaNa tA SAsanasya ArakzaNa tA alpa BAzaNa tA mita BAzaNa tA prativacana kOSalyam pratyarTika nigrahaH kAla pratikramaNa tA akAla vivarjana tA pRTagjanezu aviSvAsaH duHKitAnAm apariBavana tA teByaH ca Dana pradAnam daridrANAm anavasAdana tA duHSIlezu anukampA hita vastu tA kRpA budDi tA DarmeNa anugrahaH Amiza parityAgaH asaMcaya sTApitA vEdya  SIla praSaMsana tA dOHSIlya kutsana tA SIlavatAm aSAWya sevana tA sarva sva parityAgitA aDyASaya nimantraNa tA yaTA ukta kAri tA aBIkzNa prayogitA satkRtya prIti anuBavana tA dRzwAnta jQAnam pUrva yoga kOSalyam kuSala mUla pUrvaMgama tA upAya kOSalyam nimitta prahANam saMjQA vivartaH vastUnAm parijQA sUtrAnta aBinirhAraH vinaya kOSalyam satya viniScayaH vimukti sAkzAt kriyA avatAraH eka aMSa vacana pravyAhAra tA yaTAvat jQAna darSana anutsarjanam nizkAFkza vacana tA SUnyatAyAH Asevana tA animitta nizevaNa tA apraNihita svaBAva upalakzaNa tA vESAradya pratilamBaH jQAnena avaBAsaH SIla dRXa tA samApatti avatAraH prajQA pratilamBaH eka ArAma tA Atma jQa tA alpa jQAna tA saMtuHwiH cittasya anAvilatA dRHwi kRta vivarjana tA DAraNI pratilamBaH jQAna avatAraH sTAna AsTAna prasTAna pratipatti jQAnam hetu yukti naya dvAram kAraNam mArgaH pratipattiH saMdeSaH avavAdaH anuSAsanI caryA AnulomikI kHAntiH kHAnti BUmiH akHAnti vigamaH jQAna BUmiH ajQAna prahANam jQAna pratiHWAnam yoga AcAra BUmiH boDisattva gocaraH sat puruHa sevanA
column2: dang / smad pa la mi dga' ba med pa dang / bde ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang / sdug bsngal la yid 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams len par mi byed pa dang / bsngags pa yang dag pa la ma chags pa dang / bsngags pa yang dag pa ma yin pa la mi mjed pa dang / khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang mi bsten pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / spyod yul du rgyu ba dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang / rigs sun par mi byed pa dang / bstan pa srung ba dang / smra ba nyung zhing mnyan pa dang / dal gyis smra ba dang / tshig gi lan glan pa la mkhas pa dang / phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa dang / dus su 'gro bar byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams la khyad du gsod par mi byed cing de dag la nor sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la snying rje ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang snying brtse ba'i blo dang chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing yongs su gtong ba dang / mi gsog par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims la bstod cing 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la smod pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la g-yo @9b med par bsten pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas gnyer ba dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang / rgyun mi chad par sbyor ba dang / gus par byas te dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / dpe shes pa dang / sngon byung ba la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / mtshan ma spong ba dang / 'du shes zlog pa dang / dngos po rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mdo sde mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / bden pa gtan la 'bebs pa dang; rnam par grol ba mngon sum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang / tshig mgo cig tu smra ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong ba mi gtong ba dang / nem nur med pa'i tshig dang / stong pa nyid la brten pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la brten pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa dang / ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dam pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gzhol ba dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / bdag shes pa dang / shes kyi khe nyung dus chog shes pa dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa rnam par spong ba dang / gzungs thob pa dang / ye shes la 'jug pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa @10a *//

column1: asat puruHa vivarjanA sarva Darma svaBAva anuboDa prativeDa jQAnam taTAgatena AKyAtAH budDa BUmiH paNxitEH anumoditA bAlEH pratikHiptA durvijQeyA SrAvakEH AjQAtA pratyekabudDEH aBUmiH tIrTikAnAm boDisattvEH parigRhItA daSa balEH anubadDA devEH pUjanIyA brahmaNA vandanIyA SakrEH aDigamanIyA nAgEH namaskaraNIyA yakHEH anumodanIyA kinnarEH stotavyA mahA uragEH praSaMsanIyA boDisattvEH BAvanIyA paNxitEH paryavAptavyA Danam anuttaram dAnam nirAmiHam BEHajyam glAnAnAm moditA SAnta cittAnAm koSaH jQAnasya akHayaH pratiBAnasya nayaH sUtrAntAnAm vigamaH koSasya viHayaH SUrANAm parijQA trEDAtukasya kolaH pAra gAminAm nOroGa maDya gatAnAm kIrtiH yaSaskAmAnAm varNaH budDAnAm praSaMsA taTAgatAnAm stavaH daSa balAnAm guNaH boDisattvAnAm upekHA kAruNikAnAm mEtrI doHam Samayitu kAmAnAm muditA praSAnta cAriNAm ASvAsaH mahA yAnikAnAm pratipattiH siMhanAda nAdinAm mArgaH budDa jQAnasya mokHaH sarva sattvAnAm mudrA sarva DarmANAm AhArikA sarva jQAnasya udyAnam sarva boDisattvAnAm vitrAsanam mArasenAyAH vidyA kHema gAminAm arTaH sidDArTAnAm paritrANam amitra maDya gatAnAm pratyarTika nigrahaH saha DarmeNa satya AkaraH vESAradyAnAm BUte paryeHwiH bAlAnAm pUrva nimittamaHwAdaSAnAm AveNikAnAm budDa DarmANAm alaMkAraH Darma kAyasya niHyandaH caryAyAH ABaraNam budDa putrANAm ratiH mokHa kAmAnAm prItiH jyeHWa putrANAm paripUriH budDa jQAnasya aBUmiH sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm viSudDiH cittasya pariSudDiH kAyasya pariniHpattiH vimokHa muKAnAm asaMkleSaH budDa jQAnasya anAgamaH rAgasya vEdya vigamaH dveHasya aBUmiH mohasya AgamaH jQAnasya utpAdaH vidyAyAH prahANam avidyAyAH tRptiH vimukti sArANAm tuHwiH samADi sArANAm cakHuH draHwu kAmAnAm aBijQA vikurvitu kAmAnAm RdDiH aBinirhartu kAmAnAm DAraNI Sruta arTikAnAm smRteH asaMpramoHaH aDiHWAnam budDAnAm upAya kOSalyam nAyakAnAm sUkHmam durvijQeyam anaBiyuktAnAm ajQeyam amuktEH vivartAkHarANAm durvijQeyam GoHeNa AjQAtam vijQEH jQAtam sUratEH pratividDam alpa icCEH udgRhItam ArabDa vIryEH DRtam smRtimadBiH kHayaH duHKasya anutpAdaH sarva DarmANAm
column2: dang; 'jug pa dang sgrub pa shes pa dang / gtan tshigs dang / rigs pa dang / tshul dang / sgo dang / rgyu dang / lam dang / nan tan dang / sgrub pa dang / phrin dang / gdams pa dang / bstan pa la spyod pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sa dang / mi bzod pa dang bral ba dang / ye shes kyis dang; mi shes pa spong ba dang / shes pa la gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul dang / skyes bu dam pa la brten pa dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa spong ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing khong du chud par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / byis pa rnams kyis spangs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyis shes par dka' ba dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa dang / mu stegs can gyis ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / stobs bcu dag gis rjes su rtogs pa dang lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / tshangs pas phyag bya ba dang / brgya byin rnams kyis sngon du 'gro bar bya ba dang / klu rnams kyis phyag bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams @10b kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dang / mi'am ci rnams kyis bstod par bya ba dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bsngags par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis kun chub par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i nor du gyur pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sbyin pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi sman du gyur pa dang; ye shes kyi mdzod du gyur pa dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / mdo sde rnams kyi tshul du gyur pa dang / dpa' bo dag gi g-yul du gyur pa dang / khams gsum yongs su shes pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba dag la gzings lta bu dang / chu bo'i nang du zhugs pa dag la gru lta bu dang / grags pa 'dod pa dag gi grags pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa dang / stobs bcu rnams kyis bstod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gi yon tan dang / snying rje can dag gi btang snyoms dang / nyes pa zhi bar 'dod pa dag gi byams pa dang / theg pa chen po dag gi dbugs 'byin pa dang / seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi nan tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos @11a *//

column1: ekanaya nirdeSaH sarva Bava gati upapatti AyatanAnAm
column2: tshal du gyur pa dang / bdud kyi sde rnams skrag par byed pa dang / bde bar 'gro ba rnams kyi rig pa dang / don sgrub pa rnams kyi don dang / dgra'i nang du song ba dag gi skyabs dang / phyir rgol ba rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i rnam pa dang / stobs rnams yang dag par 'tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snga ltas su gyur pa dang / chos kyi sku'i rgyan dang spyod pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi rgyan dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dga' ba dang / sras thu bo rnams kyi dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / lus yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'dod chags 'byung ba med pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug gi sa ma yin pa dang / ye shes 'byung ba dang / rig pa skye ba dang / ma rig pa spong ba dang / rnam par grol ba snying por byed pa rnams kyi tshim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin snying por byed pa rnams kyi dga' ba dang / lta @11b 'dod pa rnams kyi mig tu gyur pa dang / rnam par 'phrul bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / thos pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi gzungs dang / dran pa mi brjed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / 'dren pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / mi brtson pa rnams kyi phra ba dang / shes par dka' ba dang / ma grol ba dag gis mi shes pa dang / yi ge rnams ldog pa dang / sgra shes par dka' ba dang / rtogs pa rnams kyis kun shes pa dang / des pa rnams kyis shes pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba rnams kyis rab tu rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis bcangs pa dang / sdug bsngal zad pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / srid pa'i 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad gcig tu nges par bstan pa ste /

column1: ayam sa kumAraH ucyate sarva Darma svaBAva samatA vipaQcitaH nAma samADiH
column2: gzhon nu; 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //

column1: asmin Kalu punar sarva Darma paryAye samADi nirdeSe BagavatA BAzyamANe aSIteH na yutAnAm deva mAnuzikAyAH prajAyAH pUrva parikarma kRtAyAH anutpattikezu Darmezu kzAnteH pratilamBaH BUt
column2: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa @12a *// thob par gyur to //

dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug ba dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheb rdob pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / @13a *// rin po che'i gtsug lag khang rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkram [?] bye ba khrag khrig bla ma brgya stong du ma'i bkod pa thams cad kyis bkur stir byas / bla mar byas / ri mor byas / mchod par byas / rjed par byas / gsol bar byas te / gzhon nu / ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgyas par thos te / gzung ngo // bris so // bcangs so // bklags so // rab tu ston to // nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgoms so // mang du byas shing gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to // gzhon nu / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi tha ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste / gzhon nu / de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgya stong gi dge 'dun byung ste / de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur to // gzhon nu / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la ngas lo bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad du mchod pa dang rim gro byas te / lha'i @13b tsandan dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang bye ba byas so // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur te / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas lo bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan cing bzung ste bris so // bcangs so; ;bklags so // rab tu bton to // nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgoms so // mang du byas shing gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa / gzhon nu / de lta bas na ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na khyod kyis kyang nga bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / g-yog bya ba la brtson par bya'o // gzhon nu / de ci'i phyir zhe na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / g-yog byas pa'i rgyu @14a *// mthun pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos / gzhon nu / de lta bas na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / g-yog bya ba la rtag tu yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o //

column2: bar zhi ba dang / gti mug bsal ba dang / rigs par rnal 'byor du byed pa dang / mi rigs pa rnam par spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang 'khor ba las thar bar 'dod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang / mi nyal ba la brten pa dang / spong ba mi gtong ba dang / chos dkar bo rnams yongs su srung ba dang skye ba rnams la yid mi rton pa dang / las rnams la mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / nang gi skye mched rnams yid la mi byed pa dang / phyi'i skye mched rnams la kun tu mi spyod pa dang; bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / khyim la chags pa med pa dang / so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / gzi chen po dang / bdag shes pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs par gnas pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / bshes gnyen rnams la rjes su srung ba dang / gsang ba'i sngags kun srung ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rnam par mi 'tshe zhing gnod pa med pa dang / 'jam por smra ba dang / khams gsum thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / thams @21b cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'dun pa ni /

column1: tatra punar api BagavAn candra praBam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma  BUta pUrvam kumAra
column2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa / gzhon nu / de lta @36a *// bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o // gzhon nu / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa yin zhe na / gzhon nu / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po med pa; ngo bo nyid med pa / mtshan ma med pa / mtshan nyid med pa / ma skyes pa / ma 'gags pa / yi ge med pa / stong pa / gzod ma nas zhi ba / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par bya'o // gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad dngos po med pa / ngo bo nyid med pa / mtshan ma med pa / mtshan nyid med pa / ma skyes pa / ma 'gags pa / yi ge med pa / stong pa / gzod ma nas zhi ba / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe / gzhon nu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya'o // gzhon @36b nu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos thams cad la 'dod chags par mi byed / zhe sdang bar mi byed / gti mug par mi byed do // de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / chos de mi dmigs te / gang 'dod chags pa dang / gang la 'dod chags pa dang / gang gis 'dod chags pa dang / gang zhe sdang ba dang / gang la zhe sdang ba dang / gang gis zhe sdang ba dang / gang gti mug pa dang / gang la gti mug pa dang / gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so // chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te / myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa ste // thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med // skyes pa med cing 'gags pa med par yang // de ltar chos rnams shin tu rig par gyis // thams cad dngos po med cing yi ge med // stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri ma med // de ltar chos rnams @37a *// gang gis shes pa ni // gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod // de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnams spros pa // ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med; ;bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa // rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'di thob par 'gyur // gzhon nu / de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste / gzhon nu /

column2: ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang // sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur //

column2: brag ca thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis // glu dang rol mo de bzhin du ba yang // de la brten nas brag ca 'byung mod kyi //

column1: yaTA eva Ardram kadalIya skanDam sAra arTikaH puruzu vipAwayeta
column2: ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la // snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshags kyang //

column1: na cakzum pramANam na Srotra GrANam na jihva pramANam na kAya cittam
column2: mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min // lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min // dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na //

column1: pramANa yadi eta BaveyuH indriyA kasya Arya mArgeNa Baveta kAryam vEdya
column2: 'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya //

column1: yasmAt ime indriya apramANAH jaxAH svaBAvena avyAkRta aSva
column2: 'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing // ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan //

column1: tasmAt yaH nirvANa paTA eva arTikaH saH Arya mArgeNa karotu kAryam

column1: pUrva antu kAyasya avekzamANaH na eva atra kAyaH napi kAya saMjQA
column2: de la lus med lus su 'du shes med //

column1: na yatra kAyaH napi kAya saMjQA asaMskRtam gotram idam pravucyati
column2: gang la lus med lus su shes med pa // de ni 'dus ma byas kyi rigs zhes bya //

column1: nivRtti DarmANa na asti DarmAH yena iti na asti na te jAtu asti
column2: mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de // gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur //

column1: asti iti na asti iti ca kalpanAvatAm evam carantAna na duHKa SAmyati
column2: rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya // de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur //

column1: asti iti na asti iti uBe pi antA SudDI aSudDi iti ime pi antA
column2: yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'// gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te //

column1: tasmAt uBe anta vivarjayitvA maDye pi sTAnam na karoti paNxitaH
column2: de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas // mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yong mi byed //

column1: asti iti na asti iti vivAdaH eza SudDI aSudDi iti ayam vivAdaH
column2: yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste // gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin //

column1: vivAda prAptAna na duHKa SAmyati avivAda prAptAna duHKam niruDyate
column2: rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur // rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag /

column1: smRteH upasTAna kaTAm kaTitvA manyanti bAlA vaya kAya sAkzI
column2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam byas te // byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems //

column1: na kAyasAkzisya ca asti manyanA prahINa tasyaH pRTu sarva manyanA
column2: lus la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med // de ni rlom sems mang po thams @44a *// cad spangs //

column1: caturzu DyAnezu kaTAm kaTitvA vadanti bAlAH vayam DyAna gocarAH
column2: bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas // byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod yul smra //

column1: na kleSaDyAyi na ca asti manyanAH viditva jQAnena madaH prahIyate
column2: bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med // shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spongs //

column1: caturzu sattvezu kaTAm kaTitvA vadanti bAlAH vaya satya darSinaH vEdya
column2: bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang // byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer //

column1: na satya darSisya ca kAci manyanA amanyanA satya jinena deSitA
column2: bden pa mthong la rlom sems gang yang med // rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs // tshul khrims srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya //

column1: rakzeta SIlam na ca tena manye SruNeyya Darmam na ca tena manye
column2: chos rnams mnyan zhing des ni mi snyems te // gang dag shes rab chung ngu de snyems pa //

column1: yanA eva saH manyati alpa prajQaH tad mUlakam duHKa vivarDate sya

column2: dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan //

column1: madena mattAna duHKam pravarDate amanyamAnAna duKam niruDyate

column1: kiMca api BAveyya samADi loke na caH viBAveyya saH Atma saMjQAm

column2: de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas // nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa btsal //

column2: yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang // sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de // des kyang snying rje che bar bzhag nas ni //

column2: sman 'di btang bar gyis shig smras pa dang // sman mang bzang zhing phangs pa des blangs nas // na ba 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung //

column1: na vEdya dozaH na ca BEzajAnAm tasya eva dozaH Bavi Aturasya

column1: evam iha SAsani pravrajitvA paryApuNitvA bala DyAnaH indriyAn

column2: rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa ste // rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig /

column1: sarveNa sarvam Bava sarva SUnyam prAdeSikI SUnyatA tIrTikAnAm

column1: kiyat ciram bAlu su sevitaH pi punas pi te Bonti amitra saMniBAH
column2: ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang // de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur //

column1: na vijQa bAlezu iha viSvasanti vijQAya bAlAna svaBAva Darma tAm
column2: mkhas pa byis pa dag la @45b yid mi rton // mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni //

column1: svaBAva Bid na prakRtIya bAlA na ca asti mitram hi pRTagjanAnAm
column2: byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de // so so'i skye bo la ni mdza' ba med // chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang //

column1: sahaDarmikenaH vacanena uktAH kroDam ca dozam ca apratyayam ca
column2: yid mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dag / mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos //

column1: prAvizkaronti imi bAla DarmAn imam arTu vijQAya na viSvasanti
column2: don 'di rnam par rig pas yid mi rton //

column1: bAlAH hi bAle hi samam samenti yaTA ameDyena ameDyu sArDam
column2: byis pa dang ni byis par mthun 'byor pa // ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin //

column1: vijQAH punar vijQa janena sArDam samenti sarpiH yaTa sarpimaNxEH
column2: mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang // mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang nying khu bzhin // 'khor ba'i nyes la so sor ma brtags te // las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing; ;sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas //

column1: saMsAra dozANa apratyavekzaNAt karmANa vipAka manotarantaH budDAna caH vAkyam aSraddaDAnAH te cCedya Bedyasmi caranti bAlAH
column2: byis pa de dag bcad cing gtub par 'gyur //

column1: su durlaBam laBya manuzya lABam na Silpa sTAnezu Bavanti kovidAH vEdya
column2: mi thob rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni // bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur //

column1: daridra BUtAna Danam na vidyate ajIvamAnAH tada pravrajanti
column2: dbul por gyur cing nor yang yong med de // de nas 'tsho ba med pas rab tu 'byung //

column1: te pravrajitvA iha budDa SAsane aDyuzitA Bonti ha pAtra cIvare
column2: sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas // lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur //

column1: te pApa mitrehi parigRhItAH tAm na Acarante sugatAna SikzAm
column2: de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pas // bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa mi spyod de //

column1: te AtmanaH SIlam apaSyamAnAH citta vyavasTAm na laBanti bAlAH
column2: de dag bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas // byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing //

column1: rAtriMdivam Bonti ayukta yogAH na te jugupsanti ca pApa karmataH
column2: nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas // de dag sdig pa'i lam la smod mi byed // lus dang sems ni shin tu mi sdom pa // de ni tshig tu mi smra ci yang med //

column1: kAyena cittena asaMyatAnAm na kiMci vAcAya sa jalpitavyam
column2: su yis nyes pa ci byas @46a *// brgal lo zhes //

column1: sadA gavezanti parasya dozAn aparAdDu kim kena vA codayizye
column2: rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa 'tshol zhing rtog /

column1: AhAri aDyuzita Bonti bAlA na ca asti mAtrajQatu Bojanasmin
column2: byis pa dag ni zas la chags gyur nas // zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de //

column1: budDasya puNya ihi laBitva Bojanam tasya eva bAlAH akRtajQa Bonti
column2: sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang // de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur //

column1: te Bojanam svAdu rasam praNItam labDvA ca BuQjanti ayukta yogAH
column2: de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag / rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung //

column1: tezAm saH AhAru vaDAya Boti yaTa hasti potAna bisAH aDOtakAH
column2: de dag la ni zas de gdug par 'gyur // bal glang phru gus rtsa ba ma bkrus bzhin //

column1: kim ca api vidvAn matimAn vicakzaNaH BuQjIta AhAru Suci praNItam
column2: mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa ni // kha zas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi // de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te; ;ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson // mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag /

column1: na ca eva aDyuzita tatra Boti agRGnu saH BuQjati yukta yogI kim ca api vidvAn matimAn vicakzaNaH ABAzate bAlu kutas hi svAgatam vEdya
column2: byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs zhes smra //

column1: taTa saMgRhItvA priyavat yatAya kAruNya tAm tatra upasTapa iti
column2: de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas // de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog /

column1: yaH Boti bAlAna hita anukampI tasya eva bAlAH vyasanena tuzwAH
column2: byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba // de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'// de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnam spangs te //

column1: mocayitu kAmAH vayam Bagavan sarva sattvAn sarva BayeByaH sarva duHKeByaH
column2: bcom ldan 'das / bdag ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo // bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la bzhag par gsol / de la 'di skad ces bya ste / nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang // shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'// yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab @47b thugs rje can // mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba / mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa / lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g-yas pa bzhag ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / rdo rje lta bu dang / yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to // gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du gyur to // dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags pas brjod pa / lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa rab tu thob bo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing // dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'// bskal pa bye @48a *// mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag / de nas lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas / bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do // bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // gzhan phan sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo // dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo // brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo // chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo // snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba // shes rab shin tu yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar // don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa // lha khyod la @48b ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /

column1: aDivAsayatu me BagavAn Svastane mama gRhe Baktam Boktum sArDam boDisattva gaNena sArDam BikHu saMGena ca anukampAm upAdAya
column2: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar // mi dbang sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'debs // thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //

column1: aDivAsayati sma BagavAn= candrapraBasya kumAra BUtasya tUHNIMBAvena Svastane gRhe Baktam Boktum sArDam boDisattva gaNena BikHu saMGca anukampAm upAdAya
column2: mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir; byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du sang bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //

column1: aTa Kalu candrapraBaH kumAra BUtaH BagavataH tUHNIMBAvena aDivAsanam viditvA utTAya AsanAt eka aMsam uttarAsaFgam
column2: de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas / stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /

column1: kRtvA BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya Bagavantam tris pradakHiNIkRtya BagavataH ntikAt prAkrAmat
column2: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //

column1: aTa Kalu canda praBaH kumAra BUtaH yena rAjagRham mahA nagaram yena ca svakam niveSanam tena upasamakrAmat
column2: de nas zla 'od @49a *// gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyi lam thams cad legs par brgyan te / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam yangs shing che la / rtsva dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma med par bsal te / bye ma gtsang mas bdal nas / ka tsa lindi ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba / dbyangs dga' bar byas te / lha'i me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / padma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / aa ti mukta ka dang / ma li ka dang / tsampa ka dang / skya nar dang / kunda dang / ti la ka dang / ke sa ra dang / mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun tu khebs par byas // gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / bla re ni bres / rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs ni ngos la dbyangs / rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni aa ga ru nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul / phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang / gar mkhan lha'i glu gar dang / rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod / @49b skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo shin tu brgyan pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ku na ba dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga mu kunda dang; rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod / lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba bres shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dang / dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / lam ni sna tshogs shin tu legs par brgyan // bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng // sil snyan dag gi sgra dag rab tu 'byin // glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin te // bud med mang po bro rdung gar byed dang // gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang // me tog phreng ba bzang zhing mdzes pa yis // lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan // grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs rje can // sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs so zhes // zla 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas // rgya che yangs pa'i lam ni shin tu brgyan // lha rdzas kyi ni bye ma gtsang ma @50a *// bdal // rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram // rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs // lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes // zla 'od gzhon nu shin tu yid dga' bas // de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te // lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas // ngo mtshar gyur cing aa la la zhes smra // lam gyi g-yas g-yon dzambu'i chu gser gyi // ta la mtho zhing bzang la zlum pa dag / rin chen dril bu'i dra bas g-yogs shing dkris // sgra 'khrol rnam pa du ma mang po btsugs // de bzhin rin chen sdong po khrag khrig ni // dus kun gyi yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs // de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyan mdzes gyur pa // mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin // rin po che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni // dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes // dpe med mthong zhing che la rgyas pa dag / lam gyi g-yas g-yon 'gram du btsugs shing bkod // sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi // lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas // rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par gyur; ;g-yas g-yon su ni rin chen pog phor dpyangs // de dag aa ga ru yang nag pos bkang // pog phor kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs // lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna @50b tshogs 'byung // ji srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang // ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par // zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir // lha rdzas dpe med yangs pas brgyan pa byas // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas // zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te /

column2: tsandan gyi phye mas ni gtor /

column1: sarvAvantam nagaram utpala kumuda padma puNxarIka aByavakIrNam akArzIt
column2: skar khung dang / rta babs dang / sgo khang dang / pa gam dang / skar khung dra ba ris dang / zla ba kham pa lta bus ni brgyan cing tsandan gyis byug pa byas te / de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer @51a *// chen po dpag tu med pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas /

column1: svam ca gRham sarva alaMkAra vyUhitam akArzIt
column2: rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnam pa du mas brgyan te / rin po che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tu dbyangs / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas / phreng ba dang lda ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed du bcug / rin po che'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so // rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi bog phor ni phyogs bzhir dbyangs te / de dag nas aa ga ru 'ba' zhig gi du ba 'thul bar byas so // zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de'ang 'di lta ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni bsgrags / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang; ba dan ni sgreng / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / zla 'od kyis ni khyim mchog @51b yangs pa yang // rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas // gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi // lha rdzas seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs // 'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal pa'i gtso bo yi // dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur pa // rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan // bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas lags par bting // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod // aa ga ru yis shin tu gang byas te // phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang rnam par dbyangs // de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri rnams 'thul // zla 'od kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir // rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang // me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis // khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun tu bkram // gar byed glu len sil snyan sgra dag gis // khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gang // gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shin tu sgreng // khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin // zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen po yang // skyes bu na chung tshogs kyis brgyan gyur cing // klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang // brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'ang brgyan / bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par snga rabs kyi dus kyi tshe sil snyan sna tshogs @52a *// brgya dag ni rab tu dkrol / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba du ma ni sgreng ste / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang lha'i me tog manba ras snyim pa bkang ste / de dag las la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste /

column1: aTa Kalu candrapraBaH kumAra BUtaH imAn evaMrupAn nagara vyUhAn gRha vyUhAn Bojana vyUhAn
column2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mngon par 'byung dka' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpa' bo'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / rin chen me tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te / rta dang ba lang du ma shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres / pa / gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang / bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog manda ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i aa la la zhes lha'i ga zha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing / yid du 'ong ba /

column1: samalaMkRtya rAja gRhAt mahA nagarAt nizkramya yena gRDra kUwa parvataH yena BagavAn= tena upasamakrAmat
column2: yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste / @52b ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /

column1: upasaMkramya Bagavantam tris pradakziNIkRtya ekAnte sTAt
column2: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i me tog manda ra bas snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do // byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te / so so'i snyim pa na me tog manda ra ba yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //

column1: ekAnte sTitaH candrapraBaH kumAra BUtaH BagavataH kAlam ArocayAmAsa  kAlaH Bagavan
column2: zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa stan las langs te / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas gdugs tshod la bab pa / bcom ldan 'das / bshos gtsang sbyar lags te /

column1: kAlaH sugata sidDam Baktam yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase
column2: da de'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang / dbang che ba dang / dbang che bar grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong dang / nam mkha' @53a *// lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dvags dang / srul po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo // bde bar gshegs pa / gdugs tshod la bab bo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan // mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te // lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar // gdugs tshod bab kyi bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol // drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang // sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs / snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol // bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs tshod bab // sras dang thabs gcig bdag gi sdum par gshegs su gsol // 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur // ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa // de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon sum lung ston cig / bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni // sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de // 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur // 'di @53b na snod min sems can gang yang med // bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha // bdag la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs // ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa // de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi // byang chub shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas // mi g-yo mi 'gul bar ni gnas bcas te // byams pas sder bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas // khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsol ba mkhyen nas / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa / longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras // longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog / longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan //

column1: pUjyamAnaH BizwUyamAnaH mahatA budDa anuBAvena mahatA budDa prAtihAryeNa mahatA budDeH yApaTena
column2: sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu dkrol / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par sgreng / gzugs dang kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / bzhad dang / tsa ko ra dang / rma bya dang / tsa sha dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka la pingka dang / ku na la la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po bum sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin /

column1: raSmi kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH niScaradBiH nAnA tUrya Sata sahasrEH puzpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvarEH
column2: lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bee dbyangs 'byin / d'urya dang / aanda rnyil dang / shel dang / spug gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang / dbang po'i tog dang / rang rod can dang / ba ku la dang / ldas rtsen dang / sh'akya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun @54b 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te / spos sprul gyi snying po dang / go shir sha dang / mri na la dang / ha ri dang / ma la ya dang / tsandan dmar po dang / aa ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul / phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba / dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba glang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs su ma dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang / lda ldi mang po dang / rin po che'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o // rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa ma zhon par khrid pa dag kyang / rang gi stabs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to // tshangs pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o // g-yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba / dbang che bar grags pa / rgya che zhing rlabs che ba / bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / rna cha dang / gdu bu dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i tsong tsong dang / me tog gi phreng bas lus brgyan cing; gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog mand'a ra dang / mdog mdzes dang / ko bi d'a ra dang / sth'a la ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / tsampa ka dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / mya ngan @55a *// 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / aa ti mugta ka dang / autpa la dang / ba ku la dang / malli ka dang / kunda dang / ke sa ra dang / padma dang / ku mu da dang / padma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i aa ga ru dang / shing rin po che'i 'bras bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin tu dkrol / gos bye ba ni g-yob cing aa la zhes ga zha'i sgra dag ni 'byin / me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing /

column1: pravarzadBiH yena rAjagRham mahA nagaram tena upasaMkrAmati sma
column2: bcom ldan 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so // de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te / de la 'di skad ces bya'o // sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas // dpa' bo yon tan kun gyis rab brgyan pa // zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing // bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs par gyur // spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang // spos kyi bal glang rin chen lag bzang dang // rin chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang // de dang gzhan @55b dag rgyal ba'i zhabs 'bring byed // g-yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te // de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug / bar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste // bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs // byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing // chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes bskyed // yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon tan sems // bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zhabs 'bring byed // de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yi // blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i // sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag / de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar // gang sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir // bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod // zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha yi lus // zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug / snying rje mchog gi g-yon phyogs 'dug pa ni // 'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang // dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa // brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o // de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge 'dun te // sh'a ri'i bu 'og moonggal nag po dang // 'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka pi na // bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin koondi n+ya // kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin // legs 'ongs kron tsi gang po 'char ba po // nam gru gsus chen nye 'khor ma 'gags @56a *// pa; ;ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag / nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang // dka' thub drag mchog rig byed cho ga shes // dmod pa 'dor dang phan 'dogs nus pa yi // drang srong dul ba thal sbyar 'dud pa byed // zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis // sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma mdun bdar te // thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi yi seng ge gshegs // sems can stong rnams rab tu thar bar mdzad // ston zla tha chung zla ba nya ba ltar // skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin // tshangs pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis // mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor // grong khyer gyi ni sgo steng zhabs bzhag tshe // nags tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang g-yos // lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams kyang // me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed //

column2: de yi dus na brgya stong mang po dag / gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lhags // goo tam ri byi phur bu rgyal byed dang // koo shi ka dang 'od srung @62b m'arkanda // thams cad bshes dang par sha gar g'a dag / thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags // mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga' mgu ste // drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa aang gi ra; ;shed can ngan spong bad tsa gnas 'jog rnams // de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags // 'dza' man b'a man be'i sham b'a ya dang // 'dza' mag n'i dang grog mkhar drang srong mchog / dkar bar gnas dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams // 'dren pa blta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags // drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'// thub rgyal zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal zhing // 'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod de // thal mo sbyar nas dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng // 'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun //

column1: jalaniDi nivasanti ye suparNAH upagata brAhmaNa veSa nirmiNitvA

column1: pRTivyAm pratizWApya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya yena BagavAn= tena aQjalim
column2: mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do // skyes pa med cing 'gags med pa // sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab // gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs // yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo // dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed // thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'// sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste // bzod mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dga' dang bde // btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan @64b mchog / stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // rgyal bas thugs rje bsnyen pas na // gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad // sems can dag la thugs brtse'i phyir // btung dang bshos kyang gsol bar gda'// ae ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab // 'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste // 'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas // mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi // mi mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig po la de skad bstod // gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa // sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas // lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur // de ltar zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol / lha'i na bza' rin thang med pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol / lha'i me tog mand'a ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod /

column1: aTa Kalu BagavAn= tAm mahatIm sAgara upamAm parzadam Darma kaTayA saMdarSya samuttejya saMpraharzya samAdApya utTAya AsanAt prAkrAmat
column2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag btsal / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor de nas byung ste sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas 'di lta ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya 'di lta ste / che ba / sdong du ma dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing kho ra khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te / sa gzhi rin po che aanda rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs @87b med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa /

column1: yena ca gRDra kUwa parvata rAjaH tena eva upasamakrAmat
column2: dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nye 'khor brgyan cing spud de / bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'thul bar byas phreng ba dang lda ldis ni brgyan / me tog sna tshogs ni bkram / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang / khyams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla re bres / 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te / rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting / ka tsa linda ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g-yogs / steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams / chu zheng dang 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te / zhabs rten ni lha dang mi'i las 'das pa / dzambu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa / mu tig gi dra bas g-yogs pa / ras rin po che bcos bus g-yogs pa / seng ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung / phyogs kun tu ni nor bu rin po che chen pos snang bar gyur / rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bee d'urya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @88a *// po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to // zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stan la 'dug go / de la 'di skad ces bya ste / ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba // rin chen rdo steng bzang zhing dga' ba dang // bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams // dbus su rin chen sengge'i khri yang btsugs // lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing // phyogs su nor bu rin chen 'od cher 'byung // rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bee d'urya // ma pham rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul // ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra / rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du; ;byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas // skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du zhugs // de nas bcom column1: acintya budDa Darma aDimuktaH ca acintya budDa Darma paryezaNa akuSalaH ca Bavati acintyAn= ca budDa DarmAn SratvA na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate
column2: chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // gzhon nu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang / mang du byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na / gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro // yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i @108b tshig 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pa na / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas / de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur bas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa'ang mngon par shes pa chen po thob par gyur to // sems can dpag tu med pa'ang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g-yos / rab tu g-yos / kun tu rab tu g-yos / 'gul / rab tu 'gul / kun tu rab tu 'gul / ldeg / rab tu ldeg / kun tu rab tu ldeg / 'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs / kun tu rab tu 'khrugs / chem chem / rab tu chem chem / kun tu rab tu chem chem / 'ur 'ur / rab tu 'ur 'ur / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur; shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho / nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho / byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho / lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho / mtha' @109a *// dma' na dbus mtho / dbus dma' na mtha' mtho zhing / snang ba dpag tu med pa'ang 'jig rten du byung / lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo / lha dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te lhags pa de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs te / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas aa la la zhes gzhan sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do // lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so // lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rab tu rdung ngo / brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer to // aa la la / bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de / 'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas / bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag thams cad kyang gcig car mthun par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du / bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag @109b thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyi'o //

column1: pUrva yoga parivartaH
column2: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo / bam po bdun pa / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa / gzhon nu / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad la gdon mi za bar bya'o // 'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o // sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang; yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson pa dang / chos la don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / chos @114b yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa la zhugs par bya'o // des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o // gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la'ang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o // gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par blangs te gnas na de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro // lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom gyi mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bslab pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges bar bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa /
