column1: yAvantaH kumAra vijQAna vyAhArAH tAvantaH taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH iti hi kumAra aprameyAH acintyAH asaMKyeyAH atulya AmApya aparimANAH taTAgatasya rUpa varNa vyAhArAH iti hi kumAra aparyantAH anantAH rUpa vyAhArAH
column2: rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod @122b pa'ang de snyed de / gzhon nu /

column1: evam acintyAH taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
column2: de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste; de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gzhon nu /

column1: iti hi anantAH aparyantAH acintyAH vijQAna vyAhArAH
column2: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa mtha' yas mu med de /

column1: evam acintyAH taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH
column2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo // gzhon nu /

column1: iti hi kumAra aprameyAH asaMKyeyAH saMskRte dozAH
column2: de ltar 'dus byas la'ang nyes pa grangs med /

column1: aprameyAH asaMKyeyAH nirvANe anuSaMsAH
column2: mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang phan yon grangs med de /

column1: asaMKyeyAH taTAgatasya varNAH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do //

column1: iti hi kumAra yAvanti nirvANa nAmAni tAvantaH taTAgatasya varNAH
column2: gzhon nu / 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang de snyed do // gzhon nu /

column1: iti hi kumAra asaMKyeyAni nirvANa nAmAni
column2: 'di ltar mya ngan 'das pa'i ming grangs med de /

column1: asaMKyeyAH taTAgatasya varNAH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do //

column1: catvAraH ime kumAra taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH acintyAH acintya vyAhArAH
column2: gzhon nu / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste / de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no //

column1: katame catvAraH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta acintyaH saMskAra vyAhAraH acintyaH svara vyAhAraH acintyaH saMkleSa vyAhAra
column2: 'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba @123a *//

column1: acintyaH vyavadAna vyAhAraH
column2: brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /

column1: ime kumAra catvAraH taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH acintyAH acintya vyAhArAH
column2: gzhon nu / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa / bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa bzhi'o //

column1: catvAraH ime kumAra taTAgatasya varNa vyAhArAH acintyAH acintya nirdeSAH
column2: gzhon nu / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa / bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste /

column1: te na sukaram paryanta nizWA sTAnena nirdezwum
column2: de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no //

column1: katame catvAraH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na /

column1: ezaH eva catuzkaH
column2: bzhi po de dag nyid de /

column1: evam vistareNa nirdezwavyam
column2: de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o // gzhon nu /

column1: yat uta catvAraH boDisattvAnAm nayAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catasraH yuktayaH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH dvArAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems @123b dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAra nirdeSAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na; 'du byed nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o //

column1: catvAraH GozAH
column2: gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig bsam @124a *// gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH vacana paTAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH vyAhArAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste /

column1: catvAri saMGABAzyANi
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catasraH nAma niDyaptayaH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catasraH manuja niDyaptayaH
column2: 'di dag @124b ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi la rtog pa bzhi ste /

column1: catvAri prativacanAni
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste /

column1: catvAri dvArANi
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste /

column1: catvAri akzarANi
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH vatArAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun @125a *// nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste /

column1: catvAraH padAH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAri nirhAra padAni
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH sUtrAnta padAH
column2: 'di dag @125b ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu; 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i @126a *// tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH caryA paTAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste /

column1: catvAraH cintya paTAH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang; 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste /

column1: catvAraH tulya paTAH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste /

column1: catvAraH nantapaTAH
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab @126b pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH paryanta paTAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu; 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // @127a *// gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH saMKyeya paTAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH prameya paTAH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon @127b nu; 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam @128a *// gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvAraH parimANa paTAH vEdya  catvHri jQHnHni catvHraH jQHna saMcayHH catvHri jQHna gotrHNi catvHri pratiBHnHni catvHraH pratiBHna saMcayHH catvHri pratiBHna gotrHNi
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvHraH sUtrHnta saMcayHH catvHri pratiBHna karaNHni catvHraH sUtrHnta nirhHrHH catvHri bHhu Sruti agotrHNi
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bsags pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab @128b pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catvHri budDa DanHni
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu /

column1: catasraH boDisattva SikzHH
column2: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi ste; bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul bzhi ste /

column1: catvHraH boDisattva gocarHH
column2: bzhi gang zhe @129a *// na / 'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi ste; bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bzhi ste /

column1: catvHri boDisattva karmHNi catvHri boDisattva pratiBHnHni catasraH mHrga BHvanHH catvHri kleSa prahHNHni catvHri apHyajahanHni catvHH yajQHnaviDa manHni catvHri avidyH prahHNHni
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom par bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa @129b bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma rig pa shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na; 'du byed kyi ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs @130a *// pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbul po shes pa bzhi ste; bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi dbul po shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon @130b mongs pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyi rol shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon @131a *// nu; 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid pa shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' @131b rnams kyi dngos po shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang zag shes pa bzhi ste / bzhi gang zhe na / 'du byed kyi gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o // gzhon nu / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa /

column2: de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no //

column2: chos shes pa la tha snyad du ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / tshig thogs pa med pa dang / tshig mi 'dor zhing ma lkugs @132b mi dig pa dang / tshig zhum pa med pa 'di ni /

column2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o //// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo / bam po bcu gcig pa / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa / gzhon nu / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o // gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi re bas rang gi lus dang srog gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi mchod rten la mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba rgya cher bya'o // chos thams cad @183b kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang skad gsang mtho zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / bye brag tu 'phags pa'i tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i sems dang / yid la byed pas gzhan la rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o // rab tu gdon par bya'o // bshad par bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na / gzhon nu / chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang; gzhi ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di yin no // gzhon nu / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang / thabs kyis brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de'i tshe / gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la gnas par 'gyur te / de chos gang la'ang mi dmigs so // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pa ni smon lam thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro // @184a *// gzhon nu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam thams cad la gnas pa ni bdag dang sems can kun gyi smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de / ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang myur du thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o // gzhon nu / rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /

column2: nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu @200a *// sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do // rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do // rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das na sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to // kun dga' bo /

column1: tena Kalu punar Ananda samayena tasya BagavataH ratna padma candra viSudDa aByudgata rAjQaH taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya parinirvRtasya caramikAyAm paQcASati sadDarma antarDAna kAla samaye sat Darma vipralope vartamAne ime evaMrUpAH sUtrAntA bahu jana jugupsitA bahu jana vivarjitA
column2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i padma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba na / kun dga' bo / rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste / rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do // bu pho ni stong yod do // bu mo ni lnga brgya yod do // de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpa 'bas byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la sgo bzhi yod pa / stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / pu shu dang / khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skyed mos @200b tshal gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba / blta na sdug pa / lha'i gnas bzhin snang ba / sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod do // kun dga' bo / de'i tshe de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing skye bo mang pos spangs te /

column2: byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs nas bskrad nas de dag chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to // kun dga' bo / nags khrod de'ang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snye ma dang 'khri shing dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa / dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra ba / shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi'ang @201a *// gzugs dang kha dog du ma dang / sa bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa / brag dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa / yangs shing mtho ba dang gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa / grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang dang / dri za'am / skyes bu'am / drang srong dang mi 'am ci dag gnas pa / byad gzugs dang kha dog che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa / sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa / dga' tshal dang 'dra ba kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun tu bzang po de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to // yang kun dga' bo /

column1: dvO= etO parivarjiyAH matiDarAH buDyanti boDim SivAm
column2: mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas // blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur // de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa / nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni // sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bus mdzes // dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan // sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin // gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan // mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag / grub pa'i bu mo rtag @214a *// tu gar yang byed // nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te // gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram // autpal padmas brgyan cing chu yang 'bab // 'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba // drang srong rtag tu gnas par mthun pa dag / bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas // sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon // de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di // me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te // byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis bkrongs // 'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje stobs ldan gang // dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod // de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig / byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o // gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang // gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste // zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa // bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa / de lta bas na / kun dga' bo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na / kun dga' bo / lus dang srog la chags @214b pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro // de la 'di skad ces bya ste / rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang // srog kyang g-yo zhing dbang med de // rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la // sems can gang dag chags pa ni // shin tu ma rungs las byas nas // gti mug dbang song de dag ni // sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par // mi mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song // dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni // chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la // mi gang chags par mi byed pa // de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro /

column1: ananta varNAn guNa sAgara upamAn upEmi sarvAn SaraNam kRtAQjaliH
column2: bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams // de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi //// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo / bam po bcu gsum pa / de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas @217a *// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tsho cho nges rab tu cher btab bo // chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la'ang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so // kun tu bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis // khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis // khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re // rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud // khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung // mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon // khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi // don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol // lha rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa // gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs // grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs // lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog / kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa // nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni // bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa // des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la gsungs // khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi // sangs rgyas sras bo bzhengs la bka' stsol cig / kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha // bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi // gcig pu seng ge ri dvags rgyal po ltar // dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas // @217b sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir // rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na // 'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs ba yis // bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad // 'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang // khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par //

column1: GorAn gamizye nirayAn= cyutasya trAtA na tatra pratividyate mama
column2: bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol ba // bde bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os // me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la // nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol // sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod // chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol / de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzed // nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol //

column1: karmam hi anizwam hi kRtam mayA adya yat GAtitaH yam maya Darma BANakaH
column2: chos smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te // sdig pa ma legs bdag gis deng bgyis ba // 'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye // bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med //

column1: Dik pApa cittam vyasanasya kartR Dik rAja BAvam mada garvitAnAm
column2: nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung // rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung // thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur //

column1: ekaH prayAsyAmi vihAya sarvam sAram na me kiMcid itas gRhItam
column2: 'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs //

column1: viSudDa DarmaH gata doza mohaH priyaMvadaH kAruNikaH jita AtmA
column2: 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dag chos // snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can // 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa // me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs //

column1: adUzakaH sarva jana eka banDuH kasmAt hataH me vara puzpa candraH hA suvratA kzAnti tapoDana AXyA hA rUpa dAkziNya guNEH upetA
column2: kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug brtul zhugs bzang // kye ma gzugs @218a *// dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan //

column1: hA nizkuhA SrIGana nizprapaQcA kuha prayAtaH si vihAya mA tvam
column2: kye ma g-yo med dpal stug spros pa mi mnga' ba // bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad // 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na // 'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung // 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur // ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol // kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can // kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur // kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog / lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol // kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig / kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon cig / kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon 'phags pa // tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud // kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs // khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang // brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis // byams pa chen po bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig / kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha yi lha // chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs // mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud // bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig / lha khyod lus ni bcad par mi nus te // lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang // khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di @218b mi shigs kyi // mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig / lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'// byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzes so // sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol // rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig / kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur // kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur // kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur // bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni gcad du gsol // ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung // srog chags mnar med chen por lhung ba yi / skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig ;bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol // mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol // re zhig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig / bdag gi bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir // sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod // kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab // kye ma sems can rnams la 'khon med sems // kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig / kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog / dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur // kye ma ldongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid // sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la // dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod // kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa // kye ma tshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud // kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod @219a *// bzhud nas ni // dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig / kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che // aa shvad me tog bzhin du rnyed bar dka'// shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa // kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol // tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i gzugs de yang // kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol // kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir // me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol // kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba // dbubs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med // kye kye mtshon dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod // bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des // kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can // rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol // kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang // mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol // kye kye 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa // shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la // brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs dang ldan // kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol // dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa / kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang // khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du khod // kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che // mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug / kye kye tshul @219b khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing // chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'// kye kye chos gos dur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang // rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzod // kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog / rab sbyin dka' thung bzang po khyod bzhengs shig / kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul // rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan // kye kye du la ba / rab du la rjes su bzhud // zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nas des // kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa // chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod // kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ;sad par bgyid nas theg ba mchog la khod // kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la // brtson 'grus thag gus sprel ba'i gru sbyor te // kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni // rab tu lhung zhing srid pas de da pa rnams // kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog / mnyan pa gdogs 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol // kye kye shin tu sra ba'i grur yang ni // zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod // kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la // shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog / kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin // dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa // kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis // btab pa'i sems can na ba rnam gzigs nas // kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la // chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal @220a *// bar mdzod // kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog / mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin //

column1: adya avagacCAmi mahA Rzi vAkyam kAmAH hi anityAH vaDakAH prajAnAm
column2: kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing // thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad // kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams // 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams // des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang; ;nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur // kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs // chos kyi rnga dag shin tu brdung bar mdzod // kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tshom gyi // 'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod // kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa // rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang // 'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la // mi mchog mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol // me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu tshang ba kye // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye // srid pa'i mtsho brgal spros med tshur sbyon kye // srid pa'i btson rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye // ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye // me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye // byams dang thugs rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye // me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs // dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar // tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba mdzod // bzhengs la nags @220b khrod der yang gshegs sam kye // me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog / mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan // gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye // ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig / ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo brtan pa kye // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye // me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs nga kye // bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod // lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye // lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye // bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shing thugs rje can // grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye // 'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye // me to zla ba shin tu sbyin dgyes gye // bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod // khyod 'dir du ma pu dum bur ma bzhugs shig / gong 'dir skye ba bud med tshogs rnams kyang // khyod mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel // snying skam 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid // thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs // gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang // ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang // khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs // de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes // lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // gnod sbyin srin pa mi dang mi 'am ci // snyim pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni // thams cad mthong bar dga' @221a *// nas lhags shing 'khod // drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te // skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin //
